response.overview: Four interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: an everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the one guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank, and a bitter old recluse receives an uninvited guest.
response.tagline: Poison, drowning, claw, or knife. So many ways to take a life.
response.title: Trick 'r Treat

titles.title: Trick'r Treat - Die Nacht der Schrecken

release_dates.note: Sitges International Festival of Fantastic and Horror Cinema

results.name: Meet Sam, the treat or tricking demon...
Face Carving with your dad on Halloween!
